mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dv_users ( username, password, name, email, phone, role, user_gender ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{role}, 'hidden' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dv_users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT member_id, username, name, email, phone, role, user_gender, create_at, withdrawn FROM dv_users WHERE role = #{role} AND withdrawn = 0 ORDER BY member_id
SELECT member_id AS memberId, username, name, phone, email, role, user_gender AS gender FROM dv_users WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
